Translations.Text: Ichijiku to oribu ni oite
shinaizan ni oite
mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau)
Hontoni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushi sugata ni tsukutta
Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta
Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hosho ga arou
Naze sore demo, omae wa shukyo (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka
Arra wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka
Yome,`sozo nasa reru okata, anata no omo no o nanioite
Ichi gyoketsu kara, ningen o tsukura reta
Yome,`anata no omo wa, saiko no sonki de arare
hitsu ni yotte (kaku koto o) oshie rareta okata
Ningen ni michi naru koto o oshie rareta okatadearu
Iya, ningen wa hontoni hogaide
jibun de nani mo tarinai tokoro wa nai to kangaete iru
Hontoni anata no omo ni (subete no mono wa) kisa reru nodearu
Anata wa, soshi suru mono o mita ka
hitori no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, reihai o sasageru toki ni
Anata wa, kare (soshi suru mono) ga,(tadashi michi) ni michibika rete iru to omou no ka
Keishin o susumete iru ka
(shinri o) usodearu to shite se o muketa to omou no ka
Kare wa, arra ga mite ora reru koto o shiranai no ka
Danjite sode wanai. Moshi kare ga tome nainaraba, ware wa maegami de kare o toraerudearou
uso-tsuki de, tsumibukai maegami o
Soshite kare no (kyujo no tame ni) ichimi o shoshu sa se nasai
Ware wa kanshu (no tenshi) o shoshu surudearou
Danjite so arubekide wanai. Anata wa kare ni shitagatte wa naranai. Ichizu ni sajida shite (omoni) chikadzuke. 〔Sajida〕
